node.title: Marília Mendonça, Brazilian Pop Singer, Dies in Plane Crash at 26
node.alt: The singer Marília Mendonça performing in Sao Jose dos Campos, Brazil, in September. She died on Friday in a plane crash.
node.description: Ms. Mendonça, who was a social media sensation with millions of followers, was iconic in a type of Brazilian country music called sertanejo.
node.content: ["Mar\u00edlia Mendon\u00e7a, one of the most popular Brazilian pop singers who was known as \u201cThe Queen of Suffering\u201d for her angst-filled ballads, was killed on Friday in a small plane crash in the southeastern state of Minas Gerais in Brazil. She was 26.", "The singer\u2019s press office confirmed Ms. Mendon\u00e7a\u2019s death and said her producer, Henrique Ribeiro; her uncle who was also her assistant, Abicieli Silveira Dias Filho; and the pilot and co-pilot of the plane were also killed.", "The plane had been headed from the city of Goiania to Caratinga, where Ms. Mendon\u00e7a was to have performed in a concert on Friday night. There was no immediate word on the circumstances leading up to the crash. The authorities said they were investigating.", "Ms. Mendon\u00e7a was iconic in a type of Brazilian country music called sertanejo, a popular genre in Brazil. Her legions of fans found power in her song lyrics, which implored women to reject bad and abusive relationships, and told the stories of flawed characters.", "Ms. Mendon\u00e7a was a social media sensation, with 7.8 million followers on Twitter, 22 million on YouTube and more than 38 million on Instagram.", "Brazil\u2019s president, Jair Bolsonaro, said on Twitter, \u201cThe whole country receives in shock the news of the death of the young country singer Mar\u00edlia Mendon\u00e7a, one of the greatest artists of her generation, whom, with her unique voice, charisma and music won the affection and admiration of all of us.\u201d", "Anitta, a funk singer popular in Brazil, said on Twitter: \u201cI just found out. I can\u2019t believe it.\u201d", "Some in Brazil\u2019s cosmopolitan circles had scorned Ms. Mendon\u00e7a\u2019s country ballads as \u201c\u2018brega,\u2019 or corny music,\u201d NPR reported in 2019.", "\u201cSentimental or not, her songs offer a woman\u2019s perspective that hasn\u2019t been heard much in sertanejo\u2019s machismo culture, and it\u2019s made Mendon\u00e7a the leading voice of a new subgenre called \u2018feminejo\u2019 \u2014 music by and for women,\u201d NPR said."]
